data.title: Lindsay Lohan Thanks Nancy Meyers for The Parent Trap
data.meta_description: Lindsay Lohan has thanked Nancy Meyers for a â€˜life changing experience' while marking the anniversary of 'The Parent Trap'
data.text:
The Parent Trap made its mark on legions of moviegoers, including the filmâ€™s leading little lady.

Lindsay Lohan shared her appreciation for the 1998 family comedy â€” Disneyâ€™s remake of its own 1961 classic starring Hayley Mills â€” marking the movieâ€™s 26th anniversary via social media on Tuesday, July 30.

In an Instagram post from the filmâ€™s director, Nancy Meyers, that paid tribute to the â€œbest castâ€ and tagged Lohan, 38, the actress gushed about her on-set experience.

â€œThank you for an incredibly, life changing experience on this beautiful film! Love you Nancy!â€ the Mean Girls star commented. â€œâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸ more than anything, I cherish our friendship ğŸ™â€

Meyers, 74, included a throwback photo of herself directing a young Lohan, who was 11 at the time, while on-set. Lohan, who portrayed twin sisters, Hallie â€œHalâ€ Parker and Annie â€œAnnâ€ James, in the film, is in character in the photo, dressed in a chic twin-set and matching headband.

The film, which also starred Dennis Quaid and the late Natasha Richardson, followed the twinsâ€™ journey after being raised apart from one another by each of their biological parents. The sisters meet for the first time during a summer camp and plot to reunite their separated parents, too.

Lohanâ€™s sweet comments come as the mom-of-one, who shares son Luai, 1, with husband Bader Shammas, revisits yet another iconic film from her Disney past.

Disney announced on June 24 that production on a sequel to 2003â€™s Freaky Friday had commenced. The studio shared a photo of Lohan and her original costar, Jamie Lee Curtis, in front of their trailers on set.

What Is the Best Romantic Comedy of All Time?

Picking up â€œyears afterâ€ the original body-swap comedy in which Tess, played by Curtis, 65, and Anna, played by Lohan, experienced a serious identity crisis, Anna now â€œhas a daughter of her own and a soon-to-be stepdaughter,â€ as outlined by Disney. â€œAs they navigate the myriad challenges that come when two families merge, Tess and Anna discover that lightning might indeed strike twice.â€

Lohan also recently expressed her gratitude over life in general, reflecting on her 38th birthday in an Instagram post on July 3.

â€œAnother trip around the sun ğŸ‚ğŸ¥³ğŸ‰ğŸ˜˜ğŸ™ grateful for every moment and cherishing every second of everyday and all of the beautiful things life has to offer. Feeling blessed. Thank you for all of the lovely birthday wishes â˜ºï¸,â€ the actress captioned a beaming photo of herself.

A source revealed to Us in March that Lohan is looking forward to planning for a second child, and perhaps even more.

â€œLindsay wants four kids,â€ the source confirmed at the time. â€œSheâ€™s working a lot, so itâ€™s just a matter of timing. Theyâ€™ll have [another baby] in the next year or two.â€
